name: pinchfsm
description: Deterministic trace generator for PinchFSM using MediaPipe Tasks (Node WASM)

scripts.trace-gen:example: node ./src/trace-gen.js --input ../../right hand hand oriented towards the camera and wrist to middle knuckle pointing up index to thumb pinch.mp4
scripts.trace-gen:example2: node ./src/trace-gen.js --input ../../right hand palm oriented to my left index and thumb pinch should be GATED.mp4
scripts.trace-gen:human:example: node ./src/trace-gen-human.js --input ../../right hand hand oriented towards the camera and wrist to middle knuckle pointing up index to thumb pinch.mp4
scripts.trace-gen:human:example2: node ./src/trace-gen-human.js --input ../../right hand palm oriented to my left index and thumb pinch should be GATED.mp4
scripts.goldens:curate-freeze: npm run human:extract && npm run goldens:freeze
scripts.ci: npm run verify && npm run human:extract && npm test --silent
